summary: Comprehensive testing of QualityStudio after Base44 refactoring completed. All 27 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend pages load correctly. Login/logout, navigation, and AI features working as expected. The refactoring from Base44 to local API client was successful.
action_items: Note: The provided admin email 'shubhrangshu@gmail.com' in the review request is incorrect. The actual demo admin email is 'shubhrangshub@gmail.com' (with 'b' at the end)
critical_code_review_comments: Base44 refactoring successful - all imports changed from '@/api/base44Client' to '@/api/apiClient'
API client (localBackendClient.js) correctly handles JWT auth with localStorage
AI service uses real GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key - NOT MOCKED
All CRUD operations working correctly for all entities

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages load correctly, navigation works, forms functional)

primary_admin.note: This is the correct email (with 'b'), not 'shubhrangshu@gmail.com'

seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing data from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Base44 refactoring verified complete. All API endpoints working. AI features (RCA suggestions, defect classification, CAPA generation) use real GPT-5.2. Frontend uses Vite on port 3000, backend FastAPI on port 8001. Authentication is JWT-based with localStorage. Quick login buttons available on login page for different roles.

ai_endpoints.rca_suggestions: PASS - returns detailed suggestions from GPT-5.2

frontend_pages.login_page: PASS - quick login buttons work for all roles
frontend_pages.dashboard: PASS - shows KPIs (Open Defects: 4, Open CAPAs: 2, Avg Cpk: 1.56, FPY: 93.3%)
frontend_pages.defect_intake: PASS - form and defect list working
frontend_pages.traceability_viewer: PASS - shows 3 complaints with workflow stages
frontend_pages.logout: PASS - returns to login page, clears localStorage

base44_refactoring_verification.functionality_preserved: All features work identically after refactoring

notes.credential_discrepancy: The review request mentioned admin email 'shubhrangshu@gmail.com' but the actual demo user is 'shubhrangshub@gmail.com' (with 'b'). Tests used the correct email.
notes.ai_integration: AI features use real GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key - NOT MOCKED
